item.title: CVE-2024-1735|2024-02-26T07:45:54.592Z -- line%20corporation -- armeria
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in armeria-saml versions less than 1.27.2, allowing the use of malicious SAML messages to bypass authentication. All users who rely on armeria-saml older than version 1.27.2 must upgrade to 1.27.2 or later.
